sentence.Network_en: Nothing was going to darken his mood today.
sentence.Network_cn: 今天什么都不会影响到他的心情。

sentence.Network_en: The sky began to darken as the storm approached.
sentence.Network_cn: 暴风雨来临时天空变得黑沉沉的。

sentence.Network_en: Please darken the blue paint with black paint.
sentence.Network_cn: 请在蓝漆里掺上点黑漆.

jx.jx_en_mean: keep away from someone's home permanently

entry.def: If something darkens or if a person or thing darkens it, it becomes darker.

example.ex: She had put on her make-up and darkened her eyelashes.
example.tran: 她已化好妆，并涂黑了睫毛。

entry.def: If someone's mood darkens or if something darkens their mood, they suddenly become rather unhappy.

example.tran: 我的好心情突然变得阴郁起来。

example.ex: Nothing was going to darken his mood today.
example.tran: 今天什么都不会影响到他的心情。

entry.def: If someone's face darkens, they suddenly look angry.

example.tran: 罗利的脸色又阴沉下来。

sentences.sentence: "He darkened the colors by adding brown"
"a scandal that darkened the family's good name"

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表动词,"变成"; 2. 表形容词,"由……制成的",通常加在名词后面; 3. 表名词,"人或物"

stems_affixes.word_buile: strait海峡,困难+en变成→adj.艰难的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
stems_affixes.word_buile: gold金+en由……制成的→adj.金黄色的;贵重的,极好的
oak橡树+en由……制成的→adj.橡木制的
wax蜡+en由……制成的→adj.蜡的,蜡制的
wood木头+en由……制成的→adj.木制的;呆笨的
wool羊毛+en由……制成的→adj. 羊毛[制]的;毛纺的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
stems_affixes.word_buile: maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
chick小鸡+en人或物→n.鸡肉;鸡,小鸡,小鸟
city城市+en人或物→citizen
heath荒野,树丛+en人或物→n.异教徒
kit=cat猫+en人或物→kitten
maid少女+en人或物→n.少女,处女 adj.未婚的,纯洁的,无经验的
vix雌狐+en人或物→n.雌狐,泼妇
ward守卫,看守+en人或物→n.看守人,管理员
bright明亮的+en变成→v.[使]变亮,[使]愉快
broad宽+en变成→v.放宽,变阔
damp潮湿+en变成→v.[使]潮湿,使沮丧,泼凉水
dark黑+en变成→v.[使]变黑[变暗]
fright惊骇,吃惊+en变成→v.使惊吓;惊恐
hast匆忙+en变成→v.催促 v.赶紧
length长,长度+en变成→v.延长,[使]变长
sharp尖+en变成→v.削尖,使敏锐
short短+en变成→v.弄短,缩小,减少
sweet甜+en变成→v.使变甜 v.变甜
threat恐吓,凶兆,威胁I+en变成→v.恐吓,威胁
tight紧的+en变成→v.变紧,绷紧,拉紧
wake叫醒+en变成→v.醒来 v.唤醒
weak弱的+en变成→v.削弱,[使]变弱

sentences.en: The sky darkens early in winter.
Please darken the blue paint with black paint.
sentences.cn: 请在蓝漆里掺上点黑漆。

means.word_mean: 再不要跨进我的门槛；再不许踏进我的家门

sentences.en: Go! And never darken my door again!
sentences.cn: 滾，不许再跨进我的门槛！
